discussion.content: On the exam objective, stakeholder is not a constraint. Stakeholder is an influence.

Selected Answer: D
Constraints effect time, cost, scope, quality, or resources.

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D. First of all, stakeholders are not constrains. Do not make assumptions in CompTIA exams because this is how they get you. Analyze the question with the information provided, with facts. You answer this question by asking, What restricts the actions (implementing and expanding) of the project?
Resource - Does not have enough technology equipment to expand.
Requirements - The results will change because they now have to expand the VoiP system to the entire organization.
Scope - work other than what is required. Implement, now expand.

Selected Answer: B
Constraints: Scope, time, cost, quality, risk, resources. I believe Stakeholders could follow under resources since resources includes workforce who is part of a project stakeholder. since a stakeholder could be anyone involve or impacted by a project
